trans-unit.source: A py.test plugin to validate Jupyter notebooks
trans-unit.target: 一个用于验证Jupyter笔记本的py.test插件。

trans-unit.source: Each cell is taken as a test, a cell that doesn't reproduce the expected output will fail.
trans-unit.target: 每一个单元格都被当作一个测试,一个单元格如果不能重现预期的输出,就会失败。

trans-unit.target: 执行

trans-unit.target: 帮忙

trans-unit.source: How it works
trans-unit.target: 运作方式

trans-unit.source: If the output lines are going to be sanitized, an extra flag, --sanitize-with together with the path to a confguration file with regex expressions, must be passed, i.e.
trans-unit.target: 如果要清理输出行 ，则必须传递一个额外的标志 --sanitize-with 以及带有正则表达式的配置文件路径，即

trans-unit.source: In general, the functionality of the IPython notebook system is quite complex, but a detailed explanation of the messages and how the system works, can be found here
trans-unit.target: 总的来说,IPython笔记本系统的功能比较复杂,但关于消息和系统的工作原理,可以在这里找到详细的解释。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: OpenDreamKit Horizon 2020 European Research Infrastructures project (#676541), http://opendreamkit.org
trans-unit.target: OpenDreamKit Horizo​​n 2020欧洲研究基础设施项目（＃676541），http: //opendreamkit.org

trans-unit.source: Parallel execution
trans-unit.target: 并行执行

trans-unit.source: Py.test plugin for validating Jupyter notebooks
trans-unit.target: 用于验证Jupyter笔记本的Py.test插件。

trans-unit.source: Regarding the execution, roughly, the script initiates an IPython Kernel with a shell and an iopub sockets. The shell is needed to execute the cells in the notebook (it sends requests to the Kernel) and the iopub provides an interface to get the messages from the outputs. The contents of the messages obtained from the Kernel are organised in dictionaries with different information, such as time stamps of executions, cell data types, cell types, the status of the Kernel, username, etc.
trans-unit.target: 关于执行，大致来说，该脚本使用 shell 和 iopub 套接字来启动IPython内核。所述 shell 是需要执行于计算机上的细胞（其将请求发送到内核）和 iopub 提供一个接口来从输出消息。从内核获得的消息的内容按字典组织，具有不同的信息，例如执行的时间戳记，单元数据类型，单元类型，内核状态，用户名等。

trans-unit.source: See docs/source/index.ipynb for the full documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整文档，请参阅 docs/source/index.ipynb 。

trans-unit.source: The py.test system help can be obtained with py.test -h, which will show all the flags that can be passed to the command, such as the verbose -v option. The IPython notebook plugin can be found under the general section.
trans-unit.target: 该 py.test 系统的帮助可以与获得 py.test -h ，它会显示所有可以传递给命令，如详细标志 -v 选项。IPython笔记本插件可在 general 部分找到 。

trans-unit.source: The regex option contains the expression that is going to be matched in the outputs, and replace is the string that will replace the regex match. Currently, the section names do not have any meaning or influence in the testing system, it will take all the sections and replace the corresponding options.
trans-unit.target: 该 regex 选项包含一个要在输出要匹配的表达，并且 replace 的是，将取代该字符串 regex 匹配。当前，部分名称在测试系统中没有任何意义或影响，它将使用所有部分并替换相应的选项。

trans-unit.source: The Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation through Grant GBMF #4856,by the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation and by the Helmsley Trust.
trans-unit.target: 戈登和贝蒂-摩尔基金会通过GBMF #4856赠款,阿尔弗雷德-P-斯隆基金会和赫尔姆斯利信托。

trans-unit.source: The commands above will execute all the .ipynb files and 'pytest' tests in the current folder. Specify -p no:python if you would like to execute notebooks only. Alternatively, you can execute a specific notebook:
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令将执行当前文件夹中的所有 .ipynb 文件和'pytest'测试。如果只想执行笔记本，请指定 -p no:python 。或者，您可以执行特定的笔记本：

trans-unit.source: The extension looks through every cell that contains code in an IPython notebook and then the py.test system compares the outputs stored in the notebook with the outputs of the cells when they are executed. Thus, the notebook itself is used as a testing function. The output lines when executing the notebook can be sanitized passing an extra option and file, when calling the py.test command. This file is a usual configuration file for the ConfigParser library.
trans-unit.target: 扩展会检查IPython Notebook中包含代码的每个单元格，然后 py.test 系统会将笔记本中存储的输出与执行时的单元格输出进行比较。因此，笔记本电脑本身可用作测试功能。执行笔记本时，可以通过调用 py.test 命令传递一个额外的选项和文件来清理输出行。该文件是 ConfigParser 库的常规配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The original prototype was based on the template in https://gist.github.com/timo/2621679 and the code of a testing system for notebooks https://gist.github.com/minrk/2620735 which we integrated and mixed with the py.test system.
trans-unit.target: 原始原型基于https://gist.github.com/timo/2621679中的模板 和笔记本测试系统的代码https://gist.github.com/minrk/2620735，我们将其集成并混合在一起在 py.test 系统。

trans-unit.source: The plugin adds functionality to py.test to recognise and collect Jupyter notebooks. The intended purpose of the tests is to determine whether execution of the stored inputs match the stored outputs of the .ipynb file. Whilst also ensuring that the notebooks are running without errors.
trans-unit.target: 该插件为py.test添加了功能，以识别和收集Jupyter笔记本。测试的预期目的是确定存储的输入的执行是否与 .ipynb 文件的存储的输出匹配。同时还要确保笔记本计算机正常运行。

trans-unit.source: The tests were designed to ensure that Jupyter notebooks (especially those for reference and documentation), are executing consistently.
trans-unit.target: 这些测试的目的是为了确保Jupyter笔记本(特别是那些用于参考和文档的笔记本)能够一致地执行。

trans-unit.source: This plugin was inspired by Andrea Zonca's py.test plugin for collecting unit tests in the IPython notebooks (https://github.com/zonca/pytest-ipynb).
trans-unit.target: 该插件的灵感来自于Andrea Zonca的py.test插件，该插件用于在IPython笔记本（https://github.com/zonca/pytest-ipynb）中收集单元测试。

trans-unit.source: To execute this plugin, you need to execute py.test with the nbval flag to differentiate the testing from the usual python files:
trans-unit.target: 要执行此插件，您需要使用 nbval 标志执行 py.test ，以将测试与普通的python文件区分开来：

trans-unit.source: To use notebooks to generate coverage for imported code, use the pytest-cov plugin. nbval should automatically detect the relevant options and configure itself with it.
trans-unit.target: 要使用笔记本为导入的代码生成覆盖率,请使用pytest-cov插件,nbval应该会自动检测相关的选项,并且用它来配置自己。

trans-unit.source: We acknowledge financial support from
trans-unit.target: 我们感谢以下机构的财政支持

trans-unit.source: You can also specify --nbval-lax, which runs notebooks and checks for errors, but only compares the outputs of cells with a #NBVAL_CHECK_OUTPUT marker comment.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定 --nbval-lax ，它运行笔记本并检查错误，但仅将单元格的输出与 #NBVAL_CHECK_OUTPUT 标记注释进行比较。

trans-unit.source: from the main directory. To uninstall:
trans-unit.target: 从主目录中卸载。要卸载。

trans-unit.source: nbval is compatible with the pytest-xdist plugin for parallel running of tests. It does however require the use of the --dist loadscope flag to ensure that all cells of one notebook are run on the same kernel.
trans-unit.target: nbval与pytest-xdist插件兼容，可以并行运行测试。但是，它确实需要使用 --dist loadscope 标志来确保一个笔记本的所有单元都在同一内核上运行。

trans-unit.source: or install the latest version from cloning the repository and running:
trans-unit.target: 或从克隆版本库并运行安装最新版本。

trans-unit.source: where my_sanitize_file has the following structure.
trans-unit.target: 其中 my_sanitize_file 具有以下结构。
